title: Poser ~ DAZ3D : Peugeot 402 Darl'Mat [RO 104809]
description:
Highly detailed character for Poser7 and greater.
 Not tested in Daz Studio.
 ROTATING PARTS with single ERC Dials:
 Select CAR/Parameters
 7 VIRTUAL TOOTHED WHEELS ARE CREATED :
 STEERING:LEFT/RIGHT ( the STEERING WHEEL controls both FRONT WHEELS and the STEERING WHEEL )
 ALL_WHEELS:ROTATION
 LEFT_DOOR:CLOSE/OPEN
 RIGHT_DOOR:CLOSE/OPEN
 WIPERS:LEFT/RIGHT
 LEFTGLASS:UP/DOWN
 RIGHTGLASS:UP/DOWN
 A Template is given so that you can change the registration


 
https://pximg.xyz/images/22ea6e9bc9b70466dc2a40c4f075e52b.jpg


Renderosity 104809 - Peugeot 402 Darl'Mat

Limited production circa 1937-1938.

Note:
What was intended as a reflection map is often used as the diffuse map, so many parts look awful out of the box. Just swap it over to the proper channel. Adjust the body colour with the diffuse channels or make your own.

(Resurrecting my last torrent from KAT. If it goes well, I will do more)
